title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the TimeLordAI project, including target use cases across various industries, desired features, key performance indicators (KPIs), and potential risks/constraints. Conduct in-depth stakeholder interviews and market research to understand the problem space thoroughly. Define project scope, clarify goals & objectives, and document them for all team members. Ensure understanding of the intended application areas for TimeLordAI.

title: Design System Architecture - Revised
description: Revised design of the overall system architecture for TimeLordAI, including components, data flow, and integration points. Considering scalability, fault tolerance, high availability, data ingestion, processing, storage, serving layers, security, monitoring best practices, and industry-specific use cases. The revised design includes: 1) Microservices architecture using Kubernetes for containerization and orchestration. 2) Streaming data pipelines with Apache Kafka for real-time data processing and ingestion. 3) Data storage solutions like TimescaleDB for time-series data management and PostgreSQL for general purpose data. 4) A robust API layer using FastAPI for serving the workflows. 5) Implementing serverless functions for cost efficiency and scalability. 6) Deploying on cloud services like AWS or Google Cloud Platform for infrastructure needs.

title: Define Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline
description: Design and implement the data ingestion and processing pipeline for time series data. This includes data sources, data formats, data cleaning, and feature engineering.

title: Develop Forecasting Models
description: Research and develop forecasting models and algorithms suitable for various time series use cases. This may include classical statistical models, machine learning models, and deep learning models.
dependencies: Define Data Ingestion and Processing Pipeline

title: Build User Interface and Visualization
description: Design and develop the user interface and visualization components for TimeLordAI. This includes dashboards, data exploration tools, and model performance visualizations.

title: Implement Model Management and Deployment
description: Develop a model management and deployment system for TimeLordAI. This includes model versioning, model serving, and model monitoring.

title: Set up Infrastructure and DevOps
description: Set up the infrastructure and DevOps processes for TimeLordAI, including continuous integration, continuous deployment, monitoring, and logging.

title: Implement Security and Compliance
description: Ensure that TimeLordAI adheres to security best practices and industry compliance standards. This includes data encryption, access control, and auditing.

title: Develop Comprehensive Testing and Quality Assurance Strategy
description: Create a robust testing strategy encompassing unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests for TimeLordAI, ensuring the quality of our end-to-end managed time series workflows. This strategy should be scalable and adaptable to various use cases across different industries.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for TimeLordAI, covering installation, configuration, usage, and troubleshooting.
